content.question: A high level of mobility for international migration and employment is best explained by which of the following demographic groups?

choices.label: Unmarried men in their late twenties with no children and a university education
Unmarried woman in their twenties with no children and a high school education
Married man in their forties with children and a high school education
Unmarried men in their thirties with children and a high school education
Married woman in their thirties with children and a university education

content.answer: Unmarried men in their late twenties with no children and a university education

skill.text: Skill 2.B: Explain spatial relationships in a specified context or region of the world, using geographic concepts, processes, models, or theories.
